# function: region_full_name

Gets the Azure full name for a region



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
region_full_name(region string) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `region` (String) Region full, short, or CLI name
